data.contentText:
Warmth and fluids are very important
Contact surgeons for ongoing management plan

metadata.text1:
Enclose intestines in plastic glove to minimise fluid loss

DO NOT use warm wet saline packs
metadata.text2:
Use the below as appropriate:
Clothes, hat, bootees
Warm incubator
Kangaroo (between mother's breasts and wrapped with towels and blanket
metadata.text3:
10% dextrose infusion as maintenance fluids
Monitor blood glucose
Nil by mouth
NG tube on free drainage with frequent aspiration

data.title: EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT
